TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContractReference extends System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference

Docs.summary: Represents a reference in a discovery document to a service description.

remarks.format:
## Remarks XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available Web Services given an URL. The URL usually points to a discovery document, which typically has a.disco file name extension. Within a discovery document are references to information about the existance of XML Web services. These references can refer to service descriptions, XML Schema Definition language (XSD) schemas or other discovery documents. This class represents a reference to a Service Description.
Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element. The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes: `ref` and `docRef`. The `contractRef` element must have an XML namespace matching the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Namespace> constant, whereas the `ref` and `docRef` attributes are placed in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.DocRef%2A> properties.
## Examples [!code-cpp[ContractReference#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference/CPP/contractreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ContractReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference/CS/contractreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ContractReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference/VB/contractreference.vb#1)]

## Remarks Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> class using the specified reference name.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>.
|Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |`Ref`|The `href` parameter that represents the reference name.|

The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description referenced in the property.
Docs.value: The URL for a XML Web service implementing the Service Description referenced in the property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element. The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes described in the following table.
|Attribute|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |ref|The URL for the service description. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> property represents the value of the `ref` attribute.| |docRef|The URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description specified by the `ref` attribute. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.DocRef%2A> property represents the value of the `docRef` attribute.|
## Examples The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.DocRef%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>.
[!code-cpp[ContractReference_Reference#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference_Reference/CPP/contractreference_ref.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ContractReference_Reference#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference_Reference/CS/contractreference_ref.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ContractReference_Reference#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference_Reference/VB/contractreference_ref.vb#3)]

Docs.summary: XML namespace for service description references in discovery documents.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element, which is a part of the XML namespace specified in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Namespace> constant.
## Examples The following code example outputs to the console the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Namespace> constant.
[!code-cpp[ContractReference_Reference#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference_Reference/CPP/contractreference_ref.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[ContractReference_Reference#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference_Reference/CS/contractreference_ref.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ContractReference_Reference#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference_Reference/VB/contractreference_ref.vb#4)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks Within a discovery document, a reference to a service description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element. The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes described in the following table.
|Attribute|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |ref|The URL for the service description.The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> property represents the value of the `ref` attribute.| |docRef|The URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description specified by the `ref` attribute. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.DocRef%2A> property represents the value of the `docRef` attribute.|

Docs.summary: Resolves whether the referenced document is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the MIME type is `text/xml` and the contents of `stream` is a Service Description, then the contents of `stream` are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.

Docs.exception:
The property is .
-or-
The service description could not be downloaded and verified successfully.
